Docs.summary: The System.Linq namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/add/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks The System.Linq namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll).
The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> class contains [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/add/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] standard query operators that operate on objects that implement <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
For information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL [LINQ to SQL]](../Topic/LINQ%20to%20SQL.md).
